title: Faustian Sands
description: A small game about choice and consequence. Made over a weekend for the Ludum Dare 44 game jam.

title: Vidterm
description: A single-file BASH script that plays videos in the terminal by rendering frames as ASCII.
alt: A screenshot of Vidterm, a program that plays videos in a text-based terminal.

title: All 22650 Pokemon Fusion Combinations
description: A video compilation of all the combinations from [Pokemon Fusion](https://pokemon.alexonsager.net/), generated using FFMPEG and ImageMagick.
alt: A combination of two Pokemon, generated by Pokemon Fusion.

title: Rebuilding The Apocalypse
description: Laravel browser-based game made over a weekend for Larahack.
alt: Logo of the game Rebuilding The Apocalypse.
